The total issue is 10,000 NFTs. Each token is a completely unique and self-sufficient illustration of the main goal of what is happening - People. People who are trying with all their might to bring peace into their lives, to return their homes and loved ones.

The collection is generative and consists of 8 attributes, each of which has an average of 15 display options

The total issue is 10,000 NFTs. Each token is a completely unique and self-sufficient illustration of the main goal of what is happening - People. People who are trying with all their might to bring peace into their lives, to return their homes and loved ones.

The collection is generative and consists of 8 attributes, each of which has an average of 15 display options

we are Ukrainians

We know and understand

We know and understand firsthand how important and necessary sometimes the cohesion of society is. People from all over the world have united around our beautiful country, which, last but not least, helps us to hold our positions and not lose heart

We are a team of crypto-enthusiasts / developers, We are part of a very powerful and influential community, knowing this, we have developed a tool with which this community can influence a real incident and show itself in offline life.
